title: CBC Life
text:
Kyne Santos, aka online kyne, has taken his signature drag look and turned it up so you can slay the competition at every single Halloween party and costume contest this year. The legend of the shapeshifting creature known as the werewolf dates back as far as Herodotus where an entire Scythian tribe transformed into wolves for a few days of every year. So, group costume idea. Or be the only wolf worth watching. Up to you.

If you're interested in other mythological creature looks, check out Julia Dantas' only mermaid makeup tutorial you will ever need and her last minute mummy, ghost and vampire looks. Or check out onlinekyne on YouTube for more marvellous looks, from Medusa to Marie Antoinette.
